QuestData.Title: Ellia Ravenmane: Redemption
QuestData.Description: Ellia Ravenmane, your rival, has returned. She demands that you meet her atop the Pedestal of Hope.$b$bYou need to understand, $n... something horrible has happened to her. She has changed. You will see for yourself when you arrive at the pedestal.$b$bGood luck, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Ellia Ravenmane atop the Pedestal of Hope.
